description: Award-winning radio fresh from the winners-circle to your computer. From the Peabody Awards, to the Prix Italia to the New York Festivals - every mp3 is a champ.
title: And the Winner Is...

description:
Les Années lumière vous invitent à un fabuleux voyage hebdomadaire au pays de l'astronomie, de la biologie, de la chimie, de l'environnement, de l'exploration spatiale, de la génétique, du génie, de l'histoire, de la philosophie des sciences et bien d'autres... 
      Fréquence de publication : Hebdomadaire

title: Les années lumière

description: Listening to As It Happens is like taking a trip around the world. From the complex headlines of the day to the weird and wacky, As It Happens brings you the story behind the story.
title: As It Happens

description: Every week, Spark producer and technology columnist Anshuman Iddamsetty examines the larger stories behind our ever-evolving digital landscape.
title: Bandwidth

description: The Bottom Line with David Suzuki explores the disconnect between our modern values and our relationship with the Earth.
title: The Bottom Line

description:
The At Issue political panel is back! Chantal Hé bert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg, along with Dan Leger, assess how the federal party leaders fared over the summer, and where they stand heading into a delayed fall session of Parliament. 
Peter Mansbridge hosts the country's most-watched political panel, with
Chantal Hébert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg debating the week's hot
topics on Parliament Hill. Plus, feature interviews with political
leaders and newsmakers.
title: CBC News: At Issue (Video)

description:
The At Issue political panel is back! Chantal Hé bert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg, along with Dan Leger, assess how the federal party leaders fared over the summer, and where they stand heading into a delayed fall session of Parliament. 
Peter Mansbridge hosts the country's most-watched political panel, with
Chantal Hébert, Andrew Coyne and Allan Gregg debating the week's hot
topics on Parliament Hill. Plus, feature interviews with political
leaders and newsmakers.
title: CBC News: At Issue  (Audio)

description: The latest News - National and International, updated every hour.
title: CBC News: Hourly Edition

description: A master class in Canadian politics.  Seasoned insiders Kathleen Monk, David Herle and Jaime Watt explain, in a non-partisan way, how strategies are devised and decisions are made in the party back rooms and in the highest offices of power in the country.
title: CBC News: The Insiders  (Audio)

description: Tune in for a wrap-up of world and national events from a team of national reporters and foreign correspondents, hosted by Alison Smith.
title: CBC News: The World at Six

description: The World This Hour keeps you up to date with what's happening in Canada and around the world.
title: CBC News: The World This Hour

description: World Report is news that has broken overnight with a look ahead to the day's expected events. The program features the latest international news, as well as the top domestic stories. It is also an outlet for CBC journalists to break original stories.
title: CBC News: World Report

description: The World This Weekend is a half-hour news and information program. It wraps up the day's events on Saturdays and Sundays, bringing Canadians the latest developments on the stories of the day at home and around the world.
title: The World This Weekend

description: C'est la vie gives listeners a window into the life of French-speaking Canadians through interviews with people in the news and documentaries from across the country.
title: C'est la vie

description: Cross Country Checkup is Canada's only national open-line radio program, broadcast live across Canada every Sunday afternoon on CBC Radio One. Each week broadcaster and writer Rex Murphy presides over a lively discussion on an issue of national interest or importance, and invites listeners to call in with their opinions and thoughts.
title: Cross Country Checkup

description: The Current is a meeting place of perspectives with a fresh take on issues that affect Canadians today.
title: The Current

description: Host Brent Bambury gives listeners the tools they need to make brilliant dinner party conversation! This populist weekly magazine show blends the best of the worlds of news, current affairs, pop culture, the net, lifestyle and leisure. Playful and relevant, Day 6 gives listeners a fresh perspective on the week.
title: Day 6

description: Dispatches host Rick MacInnes-Rae knows what it is like to be an eyewitness to history. Go beyond the headlines with correspondents on assignment all over the globe.
title: Dispatches

description:
Euromag regroupe des moments marquants tirés des émissions diffusées sur les ondes des Radios francophones publiques : Radio France, Radio Suisse romande et RTBF (Belgique).

description: Ideas is all about ideas - programs that explore everything from culture and the arts to science, technology and social issues.
title: The Best of Ideas

description:
Mansbridge One on One is CBC Television's weekly interview program, a half-hour of relaxed yet intimate dialogue with people who are changing the world around us, and the way we see it.

Hosted by CBC Chief Correspondent Peter Mansbridge, the program welcomes an eclectic blend of newsmakers and thinkers you rarely see in conversation, from the world of politics, arts, business, science and sports.

 RSS
 
  

 Subscribe in iTunes
title: Mansbridge One On One (Audio)

description: A weekly look at what it means to be a man in the 21st century.
title: Manthropology

description: Online and on-air, Dan Misener's weekly column explores the latest developments in technology, the internet, and digital culture, and the impact they have on how Canadians live, work, and play.
title: Misener on Tech

description: At The Table is a late-night television series featuring engaging conversations with Maritimers. The half-hour programs introduce compelling guests from all walks of life. Tom Murphy and Amy Smith from CBC News in Nova Scotia, and Don Connolly, host of CBC Radio's Information Morning in Nova Scotia, will welcome guests At The Table.
title: At The Table (Maritimes)

description:
CBC News' Chief Correspondent Peter Mansbridge hosts The National On Demand weekdays at 6:00 p.m. ET.  It's a unique and dynamic digest of the day's top stories for people who are on the go and online, and a preview of what's coming up on The National.

description:
Explore how the ocean holds the very key to all life within its silent and shadowy depths. Join expeditions of discovery to tropical coasts, to the deep, churning sea, and to meet strange and mysterious marine life that most of us will never get to see.

 RSS
 
  

 Subscribe in iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: One Ocean

description: Get daily access to the movers and shakers when Evan Solomon interviews the country's most influential figures. From politicians to writers to leaders from all parts of the country.
title: Power & Politics

description: Every episode of Promised Land brings a story of an escape that starts anywhere in the world, but always ends in Canada. In this 10-part series, host Natasha Fatah presents stories of dangerous getaways as described by the immigrants and refugees who endured them to get here.
title: Promised Land

description:
Quirks & Quarks covers the science and technology beat. Every week, the program presents the people behind the latest discoveries in the physical and natural sciences - from the smallest sub-atomic particle to the largest objects in the sky and everything in between.
 
      Click here to subscribe to their entire show:
       <span class="pd_upd">
title: Quirks & Quarks

description: Quirks & Quarks is also available in segments: Saturdays from July to September, 2010.  RSS    Subscribe in iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: Quirks & Quarks - Segments

description:
Canadá Direto is a half-hour weekly program dedicated to answering the needs of Brazilian-Canadians while keeping up with the topics of importance to all Brazilians. Hosted by Gilda Salomone, it features interviews, reports and analysis covering a wide range of topics, such as immigration, social, cultural, economic and environmental issues. 
      Podcast language: Portuguese
title: RCI: Canadá Direto

description:
Travel to Canadá en las Américas along with Paloma Martínez Méndez and the rest of RCI's Latin-american team. Discover the dreams, as well as the realities of Canadians and of course, those who have recently immigrated to this country. We are looking for travelers with a sense of curiosity, so if you are one of them, welcome on board!  
      Podcast language: Spanish.
title: RCI: Canadá en las Américas

description: From Radio Canada International, The Link is a daily radio show aimed at connecting new immigrants to Canada and Canada to the world. Plug in to our show for immigration news and stories. Find out what's new and exciting on Canada's cultural landscape. And get the pulse on what's happening in Canada today. Whether you live inside or outside the country, just click on The Link and get connected.
title: RCI: The Link

description: Tam-tam Canada, le magazine des nouveaux arrivants au Canada et de nos amis à l'étranger. Cette émission explore la réalité quotidienne, les difficultés et les succès des nouveaux arrivants au pays. Raymond Desmarteau anime ce rendez-vous avec la société canadienne, son évolution, ses tendances et ses points de vue. Mise à jour quotidienne.  RSS   podcastnewsletter-Jan2  Abonnez-vous dans iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: RCI - Tam-tam Canada

description: ReCivilization examines the biggest challenges facing our world, and charts a path to the future enabled by the revolutions underway in communications, innovation and learning in this new, post-industrial, digital age.
title: ReCivilization

description: CBC Radio's alberta@noon, with host Donna McElligott, connects urban and rural Albertans by exploring the environmental, agricultural, educational and political issues affecting everyone from the far north to the deep south of the province.
title: alberta@noon

description: Jo-Ann Roberts explores the stories that make a difference in your daily life. The show brings together inquiring minds from the North Coast to the Peace, down to the Southern Interior and over to Vancouver Island.
title: BC: All Points West

description: Host Mark Forsythe connects British Columbians as they share stories and ideas about what they have in common and what makes them different.
title: B.C. Almanac

description: Once a week, Earlier host Lee Rosevere features a new discovery or classic favourite Canadian artist from his personal playlist.
title: B.C. Earlier

description: The Early Edition Podcast features the top story of the day from The Early Edition with Rick Cluff. Expect to hear highlights from the show's news, health, civic affairs, cultural and community coverage.
title: BC: The Early Edition

description: Join host Sheryl MacKay to meet creative people from all around the province. Hear about their passions and inspirations. You'll visit artists and in their studios, musicians and performers backstage, writers at their keyboards and chefs at the cooktop. There's great conversation and a lot of laughs too waiting for you every weekend on North by Northwest.
title: BC: North by Northwest

description: On The Coast is a great way to catch up on the day's news, and get connected to what's happening in your neighbourhood every weekday, and you'll be right up to date on all the latest sports, weather, traffic, and entertainment from around the Lower Mainland.
title: BC: On The Coast

description: On The Island is a lively and informative blend of news, reviews and interviews, designed to keep Victorians informed about the issues that matter to them.
title: BC: On The Island

description: Radio West is B.C.'s newest afternoon show. Host Rebecca Zandbergen meets the people behind the news in B.C.'s Interior, and gives listeners a chance to share their stories too.
title: BC: Radio West

description: Whether you spend your mornings in your kitchen, your car or your office, tune in to the Calgary Eyeopener for the information you need to stay in touch with your city.
title: Calgary: Eyeopener

description: Designed to ease Calgary commuters' transitions from the end of the workday back to their families, The Homestretch offers an entertaining and lively blend of news and information.
title: Calgary: The Homestretch

description: By speaking every week with experienced skiers, snowboarders and avalanche experts, Paul Karchut finds out exactly what the snow is like at the resorts and in the backcountry of southern Alberta and Eastern British Columbia.
title: Calgary: The Real Ski Report

description: Information Morning Cape Breton helps listeners better understand and explore the challenges in our island's future, remember their past and celebrate their neighbours' accomplishments.
title: Cape Breton: Info. Morning

description: CBC Radio Calgary's Daybreak Alberta helps you find out what Albertans are up to when they leave the workweek behind. Host Russell Bowers connects Albertans with one another with news and stories from across the province.
title: Daybreak Alberta

description: Join the Daybreak crew every weekday for the best in-depth coverage of local, national and international news.
title: Daybreak Montreal

description: Join Lydia Neufeld and Rick Harp weekdays on Edmonton AM for an in-depth look at the day's top stories. When Edmontonians tune in to Edmonton AM, they'll get the information they need to get ready for a day in their city.
title: Edmonton AM

description: Radio Active brings you an eye opening, entertaining slice of Edmonton life. We'll update you on the latest news of the day, take you to what's going on right now and what's happening on weeknights. We'll let you know what you should know about your community.
title: Edmonton: Radio Active

description: Manitobans start their day off right with Information Radio. Join us for a variety of stories and items, including news, sports, traffic, business, comedy and more.
title: MB: Information Radio

description: Maritime Magazine tells stories about issues and people throughout the region. We present documentaries prepared by Maritime journalists that take a thoughtful approach to the changes going on in our region. We talk about the things that pull us together as a region - and sometimes tear us apart!
title: Maritime Magazine

description: Maritime Noon delivers developing stories in the region, and keeps you up-to-date on breaking news. We track down the experts to help you make smart choices, and we always open the conversation up to you. It's about Maritimers talking to Maritimers. Join Host Norma Lee MacLeod everyday for Maritime Noon.
title: Maritime Noon

description: At The Table is a late-night television series featuring engaging conversations with Maritimers. The half-hour programs introduce compelling guests from all walks of life. Tom Murphy and Amy Smith from CBC News in Nova Scotia, and Don Connolly, host of CBC Radio's Information Morning in Nova Scotia, will welcome guests At The Table.
title: Maritimes: At The Table

description: DOWNLOAD is a new kind of program designed for the Maritimes. Think of it as a new television channel devoted to broadcasting comedy, drama, music and information programs all made in the Maritimes.
title: Maritimes: Download

description: Information Morning Fredericton is your daily survival guide. We bring you the top stories from the city, the province - and around the world. We run the stories that matter to you.
title: NB: Info. Morning (Fred.)

description: Information Morning is the essential source of news and information for radio listeners. The station broadcasts to the eastern half of New Brunswick from Campbellton to Cape Tormentine, and covers the cities of Moncton, Miramichi, Bathurst, Dieppe and Campbellton. Join the Information Morning Moncton team every weekday.
title: NB: Info. Morning (Monc.)

description: Information Morning in Saint John brings you all the news and information you need to start your day. We'll get you connected to your community, your country and the world. Without us, you won't know what's going on.
title: NB: Info. Morning (Saint John)

description:
The weekly online New Brunswick political panel, hosted by Terry Seguin.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: The Political Panel

description:
Shift is an energetic two and a half hours that connects people in the province with the events of the day and with each other.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: Shift

description:
Spin Reduxit is CBC New Brunswick's political blog. CBC reporters Jacques Poitras and Daniel McHardie analyze the latest in New Brunswick politics and decode the spin emanating out of the provincial legislature.
  <span class="pd_upd">
title: NB: Spin Reduxit

description: Join host Leigh Anne Power in Gander on the Central Newfoundland Morning Show. The show provides news along with current affairs items and stories of local interest from urban areas and the diverse rural communities surrounding the two towns.
title: NL: Central Morning Show

description: Since going on the air in 1951, "The Broadcast," as it is affectionately known, has been dedicated to covering stories about the fishing industry, reflecting the people and the communities that depend on the sea for their livelihood.
title: NL: Fisheries Broadcast

description: As comedian Andy Jones famously says, The Weekend Arts Magazine explores our "Galoot of a culture." Join host Angela Antle as she tours artist studios and galleries, jumps on stage with clowns, comedians and musicians and chats with the province's latest literary lights. Stay connected to the province's many festivals and hear about the growing business of art on WAM.
title: NL: The Galoot fro

description: Hosted by Cindy Wall and Tony Dawson, the program keeps people informed about what's happening around them. Labradorians hear about it first on Labrador Morning.
title: m WAM

description: A live political call-in show, focusing on one provocative question about the political news of the day/week.
title: NL: Labrador Morning

description: On The Go has now been on the air for 30 years, bringing Newfoundlanders and Labradorians stories from every nook, cranny and cove in the province.
title: NL: On Point Radio

description: Join host Ramona Dearing for entertainment and information on Radio Noon. The program features Radio Noon Crosstalk, a phone-in segment with special guests. There is always a range of topics, from lifestyles to political and social issues.
title: NL: On The Go

description: While you've been sleeping, the world has changed.  The Morning Show tells you how. We bring you the latest news; the stories that matter most, and the information you need.
title: NL: Radio Noon

description: The people on the west coast of Newfoundland and in Southern Labrador depend on The West Coast Morning Show to start their weekdays. The program offers national, regional and local news, weather and sports with a focus on items of interest to those living in Corner Brook and the surrounding area.
title: NL: St. John's Morning

description: Boréal Hebdo est un magazine d'information diffusé en français pour les gens des communautés atikamekw, cries et inuites. Joignez-vous à Catherine Lafrance, animatrice de Boréal Hebdo, toutes les semaines afin de découvrir la vie politique, économique, culturelle et traditionnelle au nord du Québec.
title: NL: W. Coast Morning Show

description: The North This Week features the best stories from the past seven days from Whitehorse to Yellowknife to Iqaluit. Expect to hear all kinds of great features from shows like A New Day and The Trailbreaker and many others.
title: CBC North: Boreal Hebdo

description: Information Morning kick starts the day on mainland Nova Scotia with news, survival information, compelling stories and opinions from all perspectives in the province.
title: The North This Week

description: A lively and informative blend of news designed to put Cape Breton listeners back in touch with their communities at the end of the workday.
title: NS: Information Morning

description: A lively and entertaining blend of national and regional news, interviews, book reviews and recipes, Mainstreet is designed to put Nova Scotia listeners back in touch with their communities at the end of the workday.
title: NS: Mainstreet Cape Breton

description: Ontario Morning tells you what's happening in your world - whether it's down the road or around the globe.Get the latest national and international news on World Report and local newscasts on the half-hour.
title: NS: Mainstreet Halifax

description: Host Rita Celli invites listeners to get together for a province-wide conversation about the stories that affect you.
title: Ontario Morning

description: Every night on CBC Radio 2, Canada Live presents the best in live music from concert stages across the country.  And every week the Canada Live podcast brings you highlights from some of those amazing concerts,  from pop to jazz, roots to world,  and everywhere in between.
title: Radio 2: Canada Live

description:
Canada Reads celebrates five Canadian books for three months online, at public events and on air. It all leads up to a week-long show hosted by Jian Ghomeshi. In this annual title fight, five celebrity panelists defend their favourite work of Canadian fiction. One by one, books are voted off the list, until one panelist triumphs with the book for Canada to read this year.

          Full series available.

 RSS

  

 Subscribe in iTunes  
 Download the latest mp3
title: Canada Reads

description: If a joke's worth telling, it's worth repeating. The Comedy Factory collects our favourite skits, commentaries and funny bits that appeared on CBC Radio over the past week. It's an assembly line of humour, safety-tested and priced to move!
title: Comedy Factory

description:
For reasons associated with copyrights of creative content, we're unable to offer episodes of The Debaters for free download via podcast; however, you can now purchase episodes of The Debaters with host Steve Patterson!
           Purchase Season 1 Purchase Season 2 Purchase Season 3 Purchase Season 4 Purchase Season 5
title: The Debaters

description: DNTO invites you to make discoveries about who we really are - flawed, funny, and beautiful - one story at a time.
title: The Best of DNTO

description: If you have iTunes or an iPod, you can now download and experience the Definitely Not the Opera enhanced podcast, complete with chapters, photos and links! The enhanced podcast format makes it easier for you to navigate through our weekly collection of highlights. It's like an audio slideshow on your iPod!
title: DNTO: Enhanced

description: CBC Radio Film Reviewer Eli Glasner shares his big screen thoughts on the latest and greatest movies appearing at theatre near you.  Some cinema smarts (and snark) to go with your popcorn.
title: Eli Glasner on Film

description: A weekly romp of original, biting, ridiculous, outrageous and ultimately hilarious sketch comedy from a crack team in Edmonton.
title: The Irrelevant Show

description: This summer, you can download some of your favourite Irrelevant Show sketches from past seasons, including the wisdom of Reba McEntire, the Jane Austen Drinking Game, and the thrilling infomercial for the latest invention, The Mug!
title: The Irrelevant Show: Sketches

description: CBC Radio's Laugh Out Loud presents a new, quick joke for you every day with the Laugh of the Day podcast! Currently on hiatus. Archive episodes available until June 2011.  RSS    Subscribe in iTunes   Download the latest mp3
title: Laugh of the Day

description: CBC Radio's Laugh out Loud is Canada's new home for comedy. Every week host Craig Norris features the best and funniest comics in the business. Recorded at festivals and comedy clubs across the country, LOL is the show to hear to stay on top of the Canadian comedy scene. From the famous to the found, LOL will bring you the funny every week.
title: Laugh Out Loud

description:
The 2011 CBC Massey Lectures celebrates fifty years with bestselling author, essayist, cultural observer, and famed New Yorker contributor Adam Gopnik. His subject is winter - the season, the space, the cycle. Released daily until Nov. 12. Available until Nov. 15.
 RSS  
 Now available for purchase on iTunes  Download the latest mp3
title: 2011 CBC Massey Lectures

description: Shelagh Rogers travels the country, conversing with authors and readers of all kinds.
title: The Next Chapter

description:
Avec un esprit d'ouverture et une curiosité toujours en éveil, Jacques Languirand arpente les chemins de la connaissance qui vont droit à l'essentiel: le moi, la nature, la société et la transcendance avec des questions fondamentales et incontournables. D'où venons-nous? Qui sommes-nous? Où allons-nous? Par ses réflexions et un choix musical éclectique, Jacques Languirand se révèle à la fois déstabilisant et "tripatif", à l'image du monde actuel. 
      Fréquence de publication : Hebdomadaire

 RSS
 
  

 Abonnez-vous dans iTunes  Écoutez les épisodes
title: Par 4 chemins

description: Q is Canada's liveliest arts, culture and entertainment magazine. It's a smart and surprising tour through personalities and cultural issues that matter to Canadians. Hosted by Jian Ghomeshi, Q covers pop culture and high arts alike. Q brings you big names, big ideas, and those paving the way in Canada's cultural community. Q is your cultural intervention!
title: Q: The Podcast

description: QTV is the televised version of CBC Radio One's Q with Jian Ghomeshi, which also airs on CBC's bold tv.  Featuring full length interviews with celebrities and personalities in the worlds of arts, culture and entertainment.  The video podcast brings you the best interviews for you to download and watch.  Check it out.
title: Q: The Video Podcast

description: Q Vault offers individual interviews-to-go:  memorable conversations from North America's liveliest arts, culture and entertainment magazine.  Discover - or revisit - host Jian Ghomeshi's in-depth interviews with some of the world's most fascinating cultural personalities in music, TV and film, books, theatre, visual arts, media, and more.
title: Q Vault

description: Every week, host Craig Norris counts down the very best in new music, according to CBC Radio 3. His producer Pedro Mendes rides shotgun as they chow down on a twisted jungle gym of new music, listener picks, Chartbreakers™, and mixed metaphors. And Love. Always Love.
title: The R3-30

description: CBC Radio 3 is a weekly hour of 100% Canadian music from new and emerging artists. It's one of the most popular podcasts in the country, playing the best in new rock, pop, singer-songwriters, hip hop, and electronica.
title: CBC Radio 3

description: Ab-Originals is a weekly podcast of the hottest Aboriginal music in Canada. Four of the best-known musical hosts in Indian Country will bring you live concerts, urban and hip-hop music, top 10 chart artists, and all the rest of it in their musical podlatch.
title: CBC Radio 3 Ab-Originals

description: Join R3 Host Vish Khanna as he meets with musicians and artists for a frank, informal interview over breakfast. They pick the place, Vish picks their brains. And occasionally at their plates...
title: CBC Radio 3 Breakfast Club

description: CBC Radio 3's Extended Play is a bi-weekly podcast that explores current events happening in the world of Canadian independent music. Hosted by Lisa Christiansen, it is an ongoing conversation between artists and listeners about the issues having an impact on music culture today.
title: CBC Radio 3 Extended Play

description: When it comes to breaking new sound, we are the jackhammer on the pavement of commercial music. Every week we feature artists recorded live off-the-floor as they experiment with alternate arrangements and new songs before they're released. Hosted by Tariq Hussain, it's music straight from the heart, with artists at their sweaty best.
title: CBC Radio 3 Sessions

description: CBC Radio 3 is the part of Canada's public broadcaster that devotes itself entirely to new Canadian music.  With the CBC Radio 3 Super Feed, you can catch every podcast we make and loads of amazing new tunes in just one place.
title: Radio 3 Super Feed

description: ReVision Quest is a convention-breaking radio show, hosted by Shuswap comedian Darrell Dennis, that explodes myths about Aboriginal life, and explores what it means to be First Nations in Canada today through story-telling, interviews and comedy.
title: ReVision Quest

description: CBC Radio 2's "In Concert" puts the spotlight on Canada's emerging classical music talents. The Next! podcast takes listeners behind the scenes with portraits of these young musicians along with live concert performances recorded across the country. Hosted by Bill Richardson.
title: In Concert's NEXT! Podcast

description: Saturday Night Blues has been CBC's flagship program of great blues, swing, boogie, gospel and roots music since 1986. Holger Petersen is at the helm. Subscribe to the podcast to download our exclusive interviews.
title: Saturday Night Blues

description: Every week, the Signal Podcast brings you contemporary music without borders, from "New Music" to new hybrids. A show for the musically curious.
title: Radio 2: The Signal

description: Funny, outrageous, heartbreaking true stories by Canadian writers. Hosted by Heather O'Neill, author of the novel Lullabies for Little Criminals.
title: Stranger Than Fiction

description: A podcast of the best of this lively program with host Michael Enright who tackles everything from politics to pop culture, in Canada and around the world.
title: The Sunday Edition

description: This Is That is a current affairs program that doesn't just talk about the issues, it fabricates them. Nothing's off limits--politics, business, culture, justice, science, religion--if it's relevant to Canadians, we'll find out the "This" and the "That" of the story. Each week, hosts Pat Kelly and Peter Oldring will introduce you to the voices that give this country character and through these stories provide a new perspective as to what it means to live in Canada.
title: This Is That

description:
Don Cherry gives his unique view on the game of hockey with host Ron MacLean.

title: Coach's Corner
